description: My place is close to all the best neighborhoods in Brooklyn. You’ll love my place because of the beautiful neighborhood and new renovation. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Full floor, Newly renovated, Brooklyn brownstone
review: My first Air BnB experience and it was fantastic. Todd & Ashta's place was great and accommodated 4 people comfortably. It is right next to the train station that takes you straight into Manhattan. The place was clean and we were provided all the amenities we required. They even had board games, which were fun on a rainy night in Brooklyn.  Todd & Ashta were very responsive to my texts and provided great suggestions for the neighbourhood. I would definitely stay here for my next trip to New York.
